ValidationRule.description: "Cancelled - Sales inactivity" should only be selectable only by profile GBL Marketing/Data Admin Profile or via DLR or by Rxx.xx GBL Admin Marketing User Non-SSO profile.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Cancelled - Sales Inactivity'), NOT ( OR ( CONTAINS($User.Profile_Name__c, 'GBL Marketing/Data Admin' ), CONTAINS($User.Profile_Name__c, 'IT GBL Data Load' ), CONTAINS($User.Profile_Name__c, 'GBL Admin Marketing User - Non SSO' ) ) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only marketing admin users may apply the ‘Cancelled – Sales Inactivity’ Relationship Lead status to leads.
